hero.joinText:
Join an exclusive community of high achievers who start their day at 5AM.
Transform your mornings, transform your life.

transformYourLife.title: Transform Your Life
transformYourLife.description: Join the 5AM Club to develop early rising habits, enhance life quality, and achieve personal breakthroughs.

community.title: Like-minded Community
community.description: Connect with early risers worldwide, inspire each other, and grow together.

goalTracking.title: Goal Tracking
goalTracking.description: Set personal goals, track your wake-up times, and build lasting early rising habits.

dataInsights.title: Data Insights
dataInsights.description: Visualize your progress with intuitive statistics to understand and improve your daily routine.

cta.readyToTransform: Ready to Transform Your Morning Routine?
cta.joinThousands: Join thousands of successful individuals who have already discovered the power of early rising. Your journey to excellence begins at 5AM.

success.title: Check-in successful!
success.description: Keep up the good habit of daily recording!

checkinList.title: Check-in History
checkinList.emptyState: No check-in records yet. Start your first check-in!

friendList.title: Your Friends
friendList.noFriends: You don't have any friends yet.

removeSuccess.title: Friend Removed
removeSuccess.description: You have successfully removed this friend

removeError.title: Removal Failed
removeError.description: An error occurred while removing the friend

friendRequests.title: Friend Requests
friendRequests.noRequests: You don't have any friend requests at the moment.

sendFriendRequest.placeholder: Enter username to send friend request

validation.username: Username must be 3-20 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens
validation.timeRange: Check-in time range must be at least 1 hour

descriptions.username: Set a unique username. Currently showing as: {{current}}

form.avatarDescription: Avatar is optional, email initial will be shown if not uploaded

success.title: Settings Saved
success.description: Your personal information has been updated

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password: Password must be at least 6 characters

success.title: Registration successful!
success.description: Please check your email to confirm registration
